content.rendered:
Specifications

Image
Image Sensor 1/3″ CMOS Sensor
Min. Illumination 0.1Lux / F2.0
Resolution 3MP (2304*1296)
Pan / Tilt Pan 355° Tilt 66 °
Focal Length 4mm lens
Field of view 79.5° horizontal, 93.6° diagonal
IR Light Distance 5m

Video
Video Compression H.265
Stream Main stream (2304*1296)
Sub stream (640*360)
Frame Rate 50Hz: 15fps@1296p
DNR 3D DNR
WDR DWDR
Audio
Audio Compression G.711a/PCM/AAC
Speaker & Microphone Built-in
Two Way Audio Supported

Alarm
Motion Detection Supported
Human Detection Supported
Wireless Protocol 802.11b/g/n (2.4GHz Wi-Fi)
Data Security End-to-end encryption WEP/WPA/WPA2
Protocol WebRTC
Cloud Storage Supported

General

Local Storage Up to 256GB
Power Supply DC 5V
Power Consumption 2W±10%
Dimensions (W*L*D) 73*73*120 mm
Operating Temperature -15°C ~55°C
Operating Humidity <95%
Certifications CE/FCC/RoHS

excerpt.rendered:
C2E is a premium pan & tilt smart indoor camera used for your home security. With C2E simple plug-in
installation and smart core inside, this smart pan & tilt camera assists user to have peace of mind out of the busy
life. The Wi-Fi supported pan-tilt smart indoor camera is compatible with all-in-one smart home app ZSmart,
user can check the indoor situation anytime with high resolution live video and communicate instantly through
two-way talk. Also, C2E offers user real-time notifications, motion detection and review recent activities with local
or cloud storage.
C2E will be a wise choice for living room and kid’s room, it creates a safer, smarter, and more convenient lives.
